statements: SELECT * FROM robotic_surgeries ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, surgical_procedure, surgeon_name FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT id, patient_id, surgical_procedure FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE surgery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT surgeon_name, COUNT(*) AS total_surgeries FROM robotic_surgeries GROUP BY surgeon_name ORDER BY total_surgeries DESC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY surgery_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT surgical_procedure, surgeon_name, surgery_date FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE patient_id = 12345 ORDER BY surgery_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, patient_id, surgical_procedure FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE surgery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY surgical_procedure
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE surgery_date >= '2022-01-01' AND surgery_date <= '2022-06-30' AND surgical_procedure LIKE '%knee%' ORDER BY surgery_date DESC
SELECT surgeon_name, COUNT(*) AS surgeries_count FROM robotic_surgeries GROUP BY surgeon_name HAVING surgeries_count > 3 ORDER BY surgeries_count DESC
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_name, image_description FROM images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT video_name FROM videos WHERE id = 2;
SELECT image_name, image_path, image_description FROM images WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_name LIKE 'Fun%';
SELECT * FROM images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_description FROM images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_description FROM images WHERE id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM images WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT image_name, image_description FROM images WHERE image_name LIKE '%nature%' OR image_description LIKE '%outdoor%';
SELECT * FROM surgeries;
SELECT surgery_type, surgeon_name FROM surgeries ORDER BY surgery_date;
SELECT surgery_type, surgery_date FROM surgeries WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT surgery_id, image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE surgery_id = 1;
SELECT surgery_type, surgeon_name, surgery_date FROM surgeries WHERE surgery_date <= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM surgeries;
SELECT surgery_type, surgeon_name, surgery_date FROM surgeries ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT surgery_id, surgery_type, surgeon_name, surgery_date FROM surgeries WHERE surgeon_name LIKE '%Dr.%' ORDER BY surgery_id;
SELECT surgery_id, surgery_type, surgeon_name, surgery_date FROM surgeries WHERE surgery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT surgeries.surgery_id, surgeries.surgery_type, images.image_url, videos.video_url FROM surgeries INNER JOIN images ON surgeries.surgery_id = images.surgery_id INNER JOIN videos ON surgeries.surgery_id = videos.surgery_id ORDER BY surgeries.surgery_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE surgery_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM images WHERE image_id = 3;
SELECT surgery_date, procedure_name FROM surgeries ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialization FROM surgeons WHERE years_of_experience > 10;
SELECT video_id, video_name, surgery_id FROM videos WHERE surgery_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM images ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE surgery_id = 1001;
SELECT video_name, surgery_date FROM videos, surgeries WHERE videos.surgery_id = surgeries.surgery_id;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialization FROM surgeons WHERE years_of_experience > 10;
SELECT surgery_date, procedure_name, surgeon_name, assistant_name FROM surgeries WHERE surgery_id = 2002;
SELECT * FROM surgeons;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialty FROM surgeons WHERE specialty='Orthopedic';
SELECT * FROM surgeries ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM images JOIN surgeries ON images.surgeon_id = surgeries.surgeon_id;
SELECT * FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialty FROM surgeons WHERE specialty = 'Orthopedic Surgery';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 40 ORDER BY patient_age;
SELECT surgery_type, surgeon_name FROM surgeries JOIN surgeons ON surgeries.surgeon_id = surgeons.surgeon_id ORDER BY surgery_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT DISTINCT surgeon_name, specialty FROM surgeons JOIN surgeries ON surgeons.surgeon_id = surgeries.surgeon_id WHERE surgery_type = 'Knee Replacement';
